message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: An evidence must be selected.

message.name: INF_INCOMING_EVIDENCE_LAST_UPDATED
message.locale: A caseworker must review the following incoming evidence and select an action to resolve each evidence record. The list was updated on %1z.

message.name: LAST_UPDATE_INTERNAL_USER
message.locale: %1s on %2s

message.name: LAST_UPDATE_EXTERNAL_USER
message.locale: Online by %1s

message.name: ERR_SELECT_NEWVERSION_OR_CORRECTION
message.locale: Select either New Version or Correction.

message.name: ERR_EFFECTIVE_DATE_REQUIRED_FOR_NEW_VERSION
message.locale: For new version of information on the existing evidence, an effective date must be specified.

message.name: ERR_ACTION_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: An Action must be selected.

message.name: ERR_EFFECTIVE_DATE_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: The effective dated incoming values may already exist on this case, please compare against existing evidence on %1d and correct existing using incoming values if required.

message.name: ERR_DATA_LINKED_TO_A_DIFFERENT_OBJECT
message.locale: The action cannot be performed as elements of the data were previously associated with different evidence for this client.

message.name: ERR_EARLIEST_EXISTING_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Existing evidence that is later version of incoming, must have the "Set as Latest of Incoming" performed on the earliest record on the timeline of existing evidence.

message.name: ERR_LATEST_INCOMING_MUST_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Existing evidence that is later version of incoming, must have the "Set as Latest of Incoming" performed on the latest record on the timeline of incoming evidence.

message.name: ERR_RETAIN_EXISTING_TIMELINE_OVERLAP
message.locale: The evidence history overlaps between existing and incoming. Set as Latest of Incoming cannot be used to resolve these differences, it can merge incoming and existing timeline of information where there is no overlap.

message.name: ERR_RETAIN_EXISTING_NEW_VERSION_EFFECTIVE_DATE_REQUIRED
message.locale: An effective date must be entered to indicate the date on which the existing evidence became effective.

message.name: ERR_RETAIN_EXISTING_CORRECTION_EFFECTIVE_DATE_REQUIRED
message.locale: An effective date must be entered to indicate the date on which the existing evidence became effective.

message.name: ERR_RETAIN_EXISTING_EFFECTIVE_DATE_MUST_BE_NULL
message.locale: As you are attempting to correct the initial record in the timeline, the effective date must be blank.

message.name: ERR_RETAIN_EXISTING_NEW_VERSION_EFFECTIVE_DATE_MUST_PRESERVE_TIMELINE
message.locale: The effective date specified will not result in the existing timeline of evidence being the latest, to achieve that the effective date must be between %1d and %2d

message.name: ERR_RETAIN_EXISTING_NEW_VERSION_EFFECTIVE_DATE_MUST_PRESERVE_TIMELINE_OPEN_ENDED
message.locale: The effective date specified will not result in the existing timeline of evidence being the latest, to achieve that the effective date must be after %1d

message.name: ERR_RETAIN_EXISTING_CORRECTION_EFFECTIVE_DATE_MUST_PRESERVE_TIMELINE
message.locale: The effective date specified will not result in the existing timeline of evidence being the latest, to achieve that the effective date must be between %1d and %2d

message.name: ERR_RETAIN_EXISTING_CORRECTION_EFFECTIVE_DATE_MUST_PRESERVE_TIMELINE_OPEN_ENDED
message.locale: The effective date specified will not result in the existing timeline of evidence being the latest, to achieve that the effective date must be after %1d

message.name: ERR_DELETE_EXISTING_FAILED_TO_FIND_VALID_MATCH
message.locale: This record cannot be deleted as no previously linked record or exact match was found.

message.name: UPDATE_EVIDENCE_CONFIRMATION
message.locale: %1s evidence on this case will be updated with changes shared from %2s.

message.name: UPDATE_EVIDENCE_CONFIRMATION_EXISTING
message.locale: %1s evidence on this case will be kept and confirmed as correct.

message.name: UPDATE_EVIDENCE_CONFIRMATION_ADD
message.locale: %1s evidence will be added to this case from %2s.

message.name: UPDATE_EVIDENCE_START_DATE
message.locale: The start date of %1s evidence will be updated to %2d. This update might affect eligibility.

message.name: UPDATE_EVIDENCE_CONFLICTS_INCOMING
message.locale: Where there are conflicts, information on the case will be corrected with incoming information that is shared from %1s.

message.name: UPDATE_EVIDENCE_CONFLICTS_EXISTING
message.locale: Where there are conflicts, information on this case will be kept.
